name: Make It Grow
description:
A short, experimental Tamagotchi-like,  where you have to take care of an extraterrestrial.

Length: 5 minutes.

---------------------------------------------------

Controls

[Mouse] Left-click to interact.

Stations: Scratcher | Light | Sound| Pump

The Team

Keren Schneider, Or Magen, Paz Shraibman, Idan Rooze 

Made as part of a game jam course in Bezalel Academy of Arts and design
